    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_a8d230f6739334a60c2d6f5ad3f0596da3ec234a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_a8d230f6739334a60c2d6f5ad3f0596da3ec234a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφροδίτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Venus</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the position of Venus relative to the Earth and the Sun when it is called a Morning star (left) and Evening star (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Position von Venus im 
Verhältnis zu der Masse und der Sonne, wenn es einen Morgenstern 
(nach links) und der Abendstern genannt wird (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la position de 
Venus relativement à la terre et le soleil quand elle s'appelle un 
matin tiennent le premier rôle (à gauche) et la soirée tiennent le premier rôle 
(droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a posição de Venus 
relativo à terra e ao sol quando é chamado uma estrela da manhã (à
esquerda) e estrela da noite (direita).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la posizione di Venus
riguardante la terra ed il sole quando è chiamato una stella di 
mattina (a sinistra) e stella di sera (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη θέση της Αφροδίτης 
σχετικά με τη γη και τον ήλιο πότε καλείται αστέρι πρωινού 
(αριστερά) και αστέρι βραδιού (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la posición de Venus 
concerniente a la tierra y al sol cuando se llama una estrella de la 
mañana (a la izquierda) y estrella de la tarde (derecha).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">orbite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
